title: Foxconn to deploy Nvidia servers in push for AI-driven manufacturing
description: Hon Hai Precision Industry, better known as Foxconn, said it will integrate Nvidia's RTX PRO Servers into its global infrastructure as part of efforts to accelerate smart manufacturing and enterprise AI adoption.

title: Nvidia unveils photonics switches to scale AI networks with millions of GPUs
description: Nvidia is pushing data center networking into the optical era with Spectrum-X Photonics Ethernet and Quantum-X Photonics InfiniBand. By co-packaging optics with switch chips, the company promises massive bandwidth, lower power use, and faster deployment.
